trans-unit.source: Provides facilities for managing events related to input and text compositions.
Adds a handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput"></xref> attached event.
This method adds a handler for the tunneling version of this event.
For information about the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>.
A dependency object to add the event handler to.
The dependency object must be a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
A delegate that designates the handler to add.
Adds a handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart"></xref> attached event.
This method adds a handler for the tunneling version of this event.
For information about the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>.
A dependency object to add the event handler to.
The dependency object must be a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
A delegate that designates the handler to add.
Adds a handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate"></xref> attached event.
This method adds a handler for the tunneling version of this event.
For information about the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>.
A dependency object to add the event handler to.
The dependency object must be a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
A delegate that designates the handler to add.
Adds a handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput"></xref> attached event.
This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of this event.
For information about the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>.
A dependency object to add the event handler to.
The dependency object must be a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
A delegate that designates the handler to add.
Adds a handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart"></xref> attached event.
This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of this event.
For information about the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>.
A dependency object to add the event handler to.
The dependency object must be a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
A delegate that designates the handler to add.
Adds a handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate"></xref> attached event.
This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of this event.
For information about the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>.
A dependency object to add the event handler to.
The dependency object must be a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
A delegate that designates the handler to add.
Completes a specified text composition.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> object to complete.
**true** if the text composition was successfully completed; otherwise, **false**.
Raised when *composition* is **null**.
Raised when there is no input manager associated with *composition*, or when the text composition is already marked as completed.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput"></xref> attached event.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart"></xref> attached event.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate"></xref> attached event.
Removes a handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput"></xref> attached event.
This method removes a handler for the tunneling version of this event.
For information about the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>.
A dependency object to remove the event handler from.
The dependency object must be a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>.
A delegate that designates the handler to remove.

A delegate that designates the handler to remove.

A delegate that designates the handler to remove.

Starts a specified text composition.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> object to start.
**true** if the text composition was successfully started; otherwise, **false**.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput"></xref> attached event.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart"></xref> attached event.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate"></xref> attached event.
Updates a specified text composition.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> object to update.
**true** if the text composition was successfully updated; otherwise, **false**.
